title: Sell Samaroli Whisky
metaTitle: Sell Samaroli Whisky | Legendary Italian Bottlings | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Sell your rare Samaroli whisky. We buy original Silvano Samaroli bottlings, the Evolution series, and Moon Import releases.
heroSubhead: The holy grail of independent bottlers. Buying vintage Samaroli.
introParagraph: Silvano Samaroli was a visionary Italian bottler who selected some of the greatest casks of the 20th century. His bottles are considered art, both for the liquid and the labels.
conditionFactors: Fill Level: Old Samaroli bottles often have low fills. Below shoulder significantly hurts value.
Label Integrity: The art labels are delicate. Tears are a problem.
Capsule: Original foil integrity is key to proving authenticity.
Color: Dark sherry vs pale bourbon wood impacts the specific release.
pricingFactors: The Legends: Laphroaig 1967, Bowmore Bouquet 1966, Springbank 12 100 Proof. These are $50k+ bottles.
Era: Silvano era (pre-2008) is worth more than the modern era (Bleve).
Distillery: Islay malts bottled by Samaroli are the peak of the market.
Rum: Samaroli Rums are currently exploding in value.

faqs.question: Is my Samaroli real?
faqs.answer: We use expert consultants to verify Samaroli authenticity. Fakes exist.

faqs.question: What is 'Glen Cawdor'?
faqs.answer: A pseudonym used by Samaroli, usually for Springbank. Very valuable.

faqs.question: Do you buy Samaroli Rum?
faqs.answer: Yes! We are aggressive buyers of vintage Samaroli Demerara, Jamaica, and West Indies rums.

faqs.question: Who is Moon Import?
faqs.answer: Another Italian bottler (Pepi Mongiardino) often collected alongside Samaroli. We buy Moon too.

faqs.question: What is 'No Age'?
faqs.answer: A famous Samaroli blend (Cuvée). Highly collectible.

faqs.question: How do I sell a high value collection?
faqs.answer: We offer white-glove pickup and wire transfer for major collections.
